item.description:
Evening flight to the South Coast for dinner at the Airport Grille.

This newly reopened restaurant destination has this review from Adventure Pilot:

“The Airport Grille has reopened under new owners, in an expanded and fully renovated location in the New Bedford terminal, with the same chef it had before. This is a fine restaurant with excellent food, even by non-airport standards. It's obviously already a very popular stop for pilots from all over the Northeast. Check the daily specials for seafood dishes, at both lunch and dinner.”

Full menu at http://www.airportgri...
(508) 99-GRILL

Make sure ATC knows you're going to New Bedford KEWB, not Bedford.

http://www.menujoy.co...
http://www.airnav.com...

New Bedford Airport is a short hop of 63NM
http://www.navmonster...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up with Patty and I with your airplane in front of the Fitchburg Terminal at 5:30PM. We will have a short discussion of the particulars of the flight with wheels up at 6:00 PM.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Evening flight to the South Coast.... part 2
